variable.name: uhdrsage
variable.description: Age at baseline UHDRS (Unified Huntington's Disease Rating Scale)

variable.name: uhdrsdays
variable.description: Days since last UHDRS (Unified Huntington's Disease Rating Scale)

variable.name: uhdrp36
variable.description: Examiner believes the participant is confused

variable.name: uhdrp37
variable.description: Examiner believes the participant is demented

variable.name: uhdrp38
variable.description: Examiner believes the participant is depressed

variable.name: uhdrp_ba
variable.description: Sum of all Participant frequency and severity scores

variable.name: uhdrp_baf
variable.description: Sum of all Participant frequency scores

variable.name: uhdrp_bafs
variable.description: Sum of product of Participant frequency and severity scores

variable.name: uhdrc_ba
variable.description: Sum of all Companion frequency and severity scores

variable.name: uhdrc_baf
variable.description: Sum of all Companion frequency scores

variable.name: uhdrc_bafs
variable.description: Sum of product of Companion frequency and severity scores
